com.sing.datetimepicker.date

类 MonthView.MonthViewTouchHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ExploreByTouchHelper
      • com.sing.datetimepicker.date.MonthView.MonthViewTouchHelper
  • 封闭类:
    MonthView

    protected class MonthView.MonthViewTouchHelper
extends ExploreByTouchHelper
    Provides a virtual view hierarchy for interfacing with an accessibility service.

    • 构造器概要

      • getItemBounds

        protected void getItemBounds(int day,
                             android.graphics.Rect rect)
        Calculates the bounding rectangle of a given time object.
        参数:
        day - The day to calculate bounds for
        rect - The rectangle in which to store the bounds

      • getItemDescription

        protected java.lang.CharSequence getItemDescription(int day)
        Generates a description for a given time object. Since this description will be spoken, the components are ordered by descending specificity as DAY MONTH YEAR.
        参数:
        day - The day to generate a description for
        返回:
        A description of the time object
